title: CNEFinder
description: A schema defining a CNEFinder run configuration

ensembl_request_config.description: Configuration options for the requests that will be made to the user-submitted ensembl sites

ref_site.description: A string holding the URL of the ensembl site/archive containing the reference genome

query_site.description: A string holding the URL of the ensembl site/archive containing the query genome

ref_mart.description: A string holding the name of the ensembl BioMart containing the reference genome

query_mart.description: A string holding the name of the ensembl BioMart containing the query genome

ref_dataset.description: A string holding the name of the ensembl dataset containing the reference genome

query_dataset.description: A string holding the name of the ensembl dataset containing the query genome

general_config.description: Task-agnostic configuration options for a CNEFinder run

min_cne_length.description: A number holding the minimum CNE length CNEFinder will search for

sim_threshold.description: A number holding the similarity threshold defining matching CNE regions

gene_name.description: A boolean representing whether CNFinder should search for CNEs based on gene names

gene_name_config.description: Additional configuration options for a gene-name-focussed CNEFinder run

ref_gene_name.description: A string holding the URL of the name of chosen gene within the reference genome

query_gene_name.description: A string holding the URL of the name of chosen gene within the query genome

index_position.description: A boolean representing whether CNFinder should search for CNEs based on index positions

index_position_config.description: Additional configuration options for a index-positon-focussed CNEFinder run

ref_chromosome.description: A number holding the chromosome on the reference genome to be searched

ref_start_pos.description: A number holding the start index on the reference genome to be searched

ref_end_pos.description: A number holding the end index on the reference genome to be searched

query_chromosome.description: A number holding the chromosome on the query genome to be searched

query_start_pos.description: A number holding the start index on the query genome to be searched

query_end_pos.description: A number holding the end index on the query genome to be searched
